notes: Heavy over-segmentation in the mid sections with multiple false and silence-based boundaries and two missed core transitions. Intro and mid-theme boundary at 48s are correctly detected
column10: but the high false positive rate lowers overall automatic confidence.

notes: Reasonable structural detection with correct intro boundary and one boundary_shift capturing the main transition. One core section boundary missed near the motivic variation. Overall moderate alignment with noticeable false positive noise.

column11: but overall structural detection shows clear progress.

notes: Heavy over-segmentation with numerous false and silence-based boundaries. Multiple core structural transitions are missed despite frequent automatic splits. Only the initial intro boundary is correctly detected.Systematic over-segmentation observed at near-regular ~10s intervals
column10: indicating a time-windowed heuristic rather than content-aware structural detection. This bias causes repeated false boundaries in stable ambient sections and suppresses detection of long-form transitions.
